Package core

Contains all the operations done by corporatique

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionBase
    Abstract class, gets the defaults string values from the configuration file.
    Corporatique
    Main launcher of the program, list the plugins, their usage and options Redirects to the plugins main, using a config file to do so, sending command parameters too.
    Delete
    Removes a plugin.
    Execute
    Will execute the Corpoplugin passed in executePlugin.
    Flags
    Allows to get configfile.properties values.
    Install
    Manage the installation of a Corpoplugin.
    Messages
    Allows to get configfile.properties values
    OtherActions  
    Update  

Package core Description

Contains all the operations done by corporatique
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Fati CHEN
